snippet: New York City has appointed three employees to serve as interim trustees to see if the South Street Seaport Museum can be saved.
abstract: New York City has appointed three employees to serve as interim trustees to see if the South Street Seaport Museum can be saved.

headline.main: New York City Appoints Employees to Serve as Seaport Trustees
headline.print_headline: New York City Appoints Trustees for Seaport
